title: MSI Orbs bug
body:
You can not open MSI orbs right now.

That's its, that's the bug

replies.body:
Hey folks,

Thanks for the reports!  We've had a few issues with the MSI orbs.  We've temporarily disabled them for purchase - they should be openable and purchasable again by tomorrow.  Thanks for your patience.
Oh no! People might not spend money because of this!!!  ASAP ALL HANDS ON DECK! WE HAVE A BUG THAT AFFECTS REVENUE! CODE 1! CODE 1!
So.... what's the verdict? been past 24 hours since the disable. Any estimated time?

>We've had a few issues with the MSI orbs

Again?

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/uk0MeJ18-update-on-yesterdays-capsule-pricing-error

Promises, promises...

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wcpusrGe,comment-id=000a0002,timestamp=2019-05-03T06:42:11.986+0000)
>
> Again?
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/uk0MeJ18-update-on-yesterdays-capsule-pricing-error
> 
> Promises, promises...

Nope, not that issue sadly. I bought the highest value pack of orbs and it most certainly not cheap lmao.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwlHowl,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wcpusrGe,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-05-02T23:23:56.453+0000)
>
> Hey folks,
> 
> Thanks for the reports!  We've had a few issues with the MSI orbs.  We've temporarily disabled them for purchase - they should be openable and purchasable again by tomorrow.  Thanks for your patience.

Can we know what exactly happened? Just wondering if it would affect much for the already opened orbs

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwlHowl,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wcpusrGe,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-05-02T23:23:56.453+0000)
>
> Hey folks,
> 
> Thanks for the reports!  We've had a few issues with the MSI orbs.  We've temporarily disabled them for purchase - they should be openable and purchasable again by tomorrow.  Thanks for your patience.

Hey there, what about the watch missions? I'm tired of making tickets just so I can finish the mission, tired of wasting hours watching matches for rewards.

Guess I'm just tired of this service, I think I'll quit. Bye.
https://youtu.be/IoyvvEWHodk

> [{quoted}](name=LordMordeMain,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=wcpusrGe,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2019-05-03T02:07:13.870+0000)
>
> https://youtu.be/IoyvvEWHodk

That's a good one, check this one out.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o28dyt7w3As
same
Likewise.
Same here
Same :/
This whole new mission system is just bugged. I've watched 3 MSI videos and haven't gotten that reward and destroyed the turrets and the mission bar doesn't even move.
I've just opened my orbs and got Gun Goddess Miss Fortune as skin shard, should it not be unlocked as a permanent skin?
yes it should
I opened an MSI Orb before they were disabled and got a bonus permanent TPA Ezreal except I did not get given the skin

I bought the 25 pack yesterday and was able to open them, I went and got another 50 dollar card to buy another 25 pack and noticed that they removed them if I had a guess it would be due to people not being able to open gifted ones. Hope they can get this fixed sooner than later.
have you been able to open yours yet? I was able to, opened it abt 30 mins ago
They're gone from the store too
Yes

Also the misions are bugged I had a mission that said: "win a game wwith as or against Katarina, Draven, Darius, Zed or Vayne or win 2 games win at least 6 take downs", I won as Katarina and the first part says 0/1 and the second part says 1/2, wtf is that
I REROLL 3 skin shards from msi orbs and i unlock a skin permanent that i have already is this possible??
same

Upvoted to get this fixed sooner.

EDIT: Even the new emotes are not showing up in the collection if you buy them.
